name: AlexanLife
0:
”Alexa, open Alexan Life.”
”Alexa, tell Alexan Life to submit a service request.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alexan life
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexan Life, the companion to Alexan Life App for iOS and Android, is your community assistant skill for Amazon Alexa, making it easier than ever to request service for your apartment. 

To get started, enable the Alexan Life skill via the Amazon Alexa app. Next, you will need to link your account to Alexan Life App by signing in. If you haven't created your account, download the Alexan Life App. 

Once you're connected to Alexa, you'll be ready to go. Try saying 'Alexa, tell Alexan Life to submit a service request'. Your service requests will immediately sync to your Alexan Life App so you can keep tabs on their progress, even if you're not home. 

Need assistance? 
If you have any questions or problems connecting the Alexan Life skill with the Alexan Life App, please contact help@residentservice.com. We're happy to help.
